TOC : Basic features >

 

Select the page

 Top  Previous  Next

 

 

Click the Etc icon on the toolbar > Click the [Page coordinate window] menu.

Click [Show Report Structure] button and click your page icon with <Shift> key in the Report structure window.

The blue check() is displayed on selected page icon. The horizontal, vertical and total page number are shown on the Page coordinate window.

 

 

Select multiple pages

You can select multiple pages by using <Shift> key, drag & drop and double-click on the Report structure window.

•  <Shift> Key

Click on the page repeatedly while holding down the <Shift>button.

 

• Drag & drop

Drag and drop the selected page area.

 

• Double-click

If double-click a page, all pages on the row that includes the double-clicked page are selected.

 

 

If you choose to "Selection" option to print range or save range, only the blue checked pages will be printed or saved.
